thread.title: Jankovic, Stosur advance to quarterfinals at Hong Kong Open
thread.title_full: Jankovic, Stosur advance to quarterfinals at Hong Kong Open

author: Fighting for his life: The downfall of basketball’s Lamar Odom, also starring the Kardashians
title: Jankovic, Stosur advance to quarterfinals at Hong Kong Open
text:
Jankovic, Stosur advance to quarterfinals at Hong Kong Open Associated Press 14 hrs ago © (AP Photo/Kin Cheung Monica Puig of Puerto Rica hits a return shot against Samantha Stosur of Australia during the second round match at the WTA Hong Kong Open tennis tournament in Hong Kong, Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015. (AP Photo/Kin Cheung) HONG KONG (AP) -- Jelena Jankovic and Samantha Stosur advanced to the quarterfinals of the Hong Kong Open on Wednesday, both winning in straight sets.
AdChoices Jankovic, a former top-ranked player from Serbia, beat Anastasia Rodionova of Australia 6-0, 6-2. Stosur defeated Monica Puig of Puerto Rico 6-4, 6-4.
''It was more difficult than it looked,'' said Stosur, the 2011 U.S. Open champion from Australia. ''She has improved quite a lot from the last time I met her but I thought I played very well.''
Stosur will next face Heather Watson, who beat Taiwanese qualifier Lee Ya-hsuan 6-0, 6-7 (5), 6-4.
Sixth-seeded Daria Gavrilova also advanced, beating Lara Arrubarrena of Spain 7-6 (4), 6-1.
